definition: horizontal tablet (for an inscription)
harsh and unreasonable/unexpected

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
variant of 額|额[e2]
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: No banners or flags shall be hung without permission.
sentences.chinese: 各机构不可擅自挂上任何横额或旗帜。

sentences.english: We allow you to run maximum of 3 banners per website for absolutely free.
sentences.chinese: 我们让您运行的最高3横额百分之网站完全免费的。

sentences.english: A banner recycling bin has been placed in the car park of Bethlehem Hall since late May.
sentences.chinese: 书院于五月底在伯利冲宿舍停车场增设了横额回收箱。

sentences.english: One of the banners put up by my office.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅由本人办事处张贴的横额。

definition: horizontal tablet (for an inscription)
area above the lintel of a doorway
a horizontal inscribed board
basket-couch in coffin
horizontal rectangular inscribed tablet hung over a door or on a wall/shallow round woven bamboo basket
couplet (hung on each side of the door frame)
variant of 匾額|匾额[bian3 e2]
couplet (hung on the columns of a hall)
decorated archway
lintel
gold lettering/gold characters
pavilion housing a stele
rhyming couplet/pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway/CL:副[fu4],幅[fu2]
a screen wall across the gate of a house (for privacy)
memorial arch
the top part of a tablet
to create a work of calligraphy for display in a prominent place (typically, a sign)
